title: Mettasutta
content_plain: sutta nipāta 1 8 mettasutta karaṇīyamatthakusalena yanta santaṁ padaṁ abhisamecca sakko ujū ca suhujū ca sūvaco cassa mudu anatimānī santussako ca subharo ca appakicco ca sallahukavutti santindriyo ca nipako ca appagabbho kulesvananugiddho na ca khuddamācare kiñci yena viññū pare upavadeyyuṁ sukhino va khemino hontu sabbasattā bhavantu sukhitattā ye keci pāṇabhūtatthi tasā vā thāvarā vanavasesā dīghā vā ye va mahantā majjhimā rassakā aṇukathūlā diṭṭhā vā ye va adiṭṭhā ye va dūre vasanti avidūre bhūtā va sambhavesī va sabbasattā bhavantu sukhitattā na paro paraṁ nikubbetha nātimaññetha katthaci na kañci byārosanā paṭighasañña nāññamaññassa dukkhamiccheyya mātā yathā niyaṁ puttam āyusā ekaputtamanurakkhe evampi sabbabhūtesu mānasaṁ bhāvaye aparimāṇaṁ mettañca sabbalokasmi mānasaṁ bhāvaye aparimāṇaṁ uddhaṁ adho ca tiriyañca asambādhaṁ averamasapattaṁ tiṭṭhaṁ caraṁ nisinno va sayāno yāvatāssa vitamiddho etaṁ satiṁ adhiṭṭheyya brahmametaṁ vihāramidhamāhu diṭṭhiñca anupaggamma sīlavā dassanena sampanno kāmesu vinaya gedhaṁ na hi jātuggabbhaseyya punaretī ti mettasuttaṁ aṭṭhamaṁ
content_json:
{
  "snp1.8:0.1": "Sutta Nipāta 1.8 ",
  "snp1.8:0.2": "Mettasutta ",
  "snp1.8:1.1": "“Karaṇīyamatthakusalena, ",
  "snp1.8:1.2": "Yanta santaṁ padaṁ abhisamecca; ",
  "snp1.8:1.3": "Sakko ujū ca suhujū ca, ",
  "snp1.8:1.4": "Sūvaco cassa mudu anatimānī. ",
  "snp1.8:2.1": "Santussako ca subharo ca, ",
  "snp1.8:2.2": "Appakicco ca sallahukavutti; ",
  "snp1.8:2.3": "Santindriyo ca nipako ca, ",
  "snp1.8:2.4": "Appagabbho kulesvananugiddho. ",
  "snp1.8:3.1": "Na ca khuddamācare kiñci, ",
  "snp1.8:3.2": "Yena viññū pare upavadeyyuṁ; ",
  "snp1.8:3.3": "Sukhino va khemino hontu, ",
  "snp1.8:3.4": "Sabbasattā bhavantu sukhitattā. ",
  "snp1.8:4.1": "Ye keci pāṇabhūtatthi, ",
  "snp1.8:4.2": "Tasā vā thāvarā vanavasesā; ",
  "snp1.8:4.3": "Dīghā vā ye va mahantā, ",
  "snp1.8:4.4": "Majjhimā rassakā aṇukathūlā. ",
  "snp1.8:5.1": "Diṭṭhā vā ye va adiṭṭhā, ",
  "snp1.8:5.2": "Ye va dūre vasanti avidūre; ",
  "snp1.8:5.3": "Bhūtā va sambhavesī va, ",
  "snp1.8:5.4": "Sabbasattā bhavantu sukhitattā. ",
  "snp1.8:6.1": "Na paro paraṁ nikubbetha, ",
  "snp1.8:6.2": "Nātimaññetha katthaci na kañci; ",
  "snp1.8:6.3": "Byārosanā paṭighasañña, ",
  "snp1.8:6.4": "Nāññamaññassa dukkhamiccheyya. ",
  "snp1.8:7.1": "Mātā yathā niyaṁ puttam ",
  "snp1.8:7.2": "Āyusā ekaputtamanurakkhe; ",
  "snp1.8:7.3": "Evampi sabbabhūtesu, ",
  "snp1.8:7.4": "Mānasaṁ bhāvaye aparimāṇaṁ. ",
  "snp1.8:8.1": "Mettañca sabbalokasmi, ",
  "snp1.8:8.2": "Mānasaṁ bhāvaye aparimāṇaṁ; ",
  "snp1.8:8.3": "Uddhaṁ adho ca tiriyañca, ",
  "snp1.8:8.4": "Asambādhaṁ averamasapattaṁ. ",
  "snp1.8:9.1": "Tiṭṭhaṁ caraṁ nisinno va, ",
  "snp1.8:9.2": "Sayāno yāvatāssa vitamiddho; ",
  "snp1.8:9.3": "Etaṁ satiṁ adhiṭṭheyya, ",
  "snp1.8:9.4": "Brahmametaṁ vihāramidhamāhu. ",
  "snp1.8:10.1": "Diṭṭhiñca anupaggamma, ",
  "snp1.8:10.2": "Sīlavā dassanena sampanno; ",
  "snp1.8:10.3": "Kāmesu vinaya gedhaṁ, ",
  "snp1.8:10.4": "Na hi jātuggabbhaseyya punaretī”ti. ",
  "snp1.8:10.5": "Mettasuttaṁ aṭṭhamaṁ. "
}
